sentences.en: Baleen whales often appear in this region. Be careful!
sentences.cn: 这一带经常有须鲸出没, 要注意安全啊!

sentences.en: But big baleen whales often run silent.
sentences.cn: 而大型须鲸常常不声不响地前行.

sentences.en: Large baleen whales are of special concern.
sentences.cn: 大型鲸须鲸是最受关注的物种。

sentences.en: Large baleen whales primarily use the lower frequencies and are often limited in their repertoire.
sentences.cn: 大长须鲸最初使用低频,他们的全套本领很有限.

sentences.en: Surfacing in warm winter waters off the Baja California coast, a gray whale flashes its baleen plates by a boat.
sentences.cn: 下加利福尼亚海岸（Baja California coast）附近，在冬日温暖的海水里，一条灰鲸浮在水面上，露出了鲸须板，旁边是一条船。

sentences.en: The collection of small marine crustaceans of the order Euphausiacea are the principal food baleen whales.
sentences.cn: 形似虾的浮游甲壳动物;是长须鲸的主要食物来源.

sentences.en: Unlike orca, which are odontocetes or toothed whales, humpbacks are mysticetes, harmless leviathans with only baleen plates in their mouths.
sentences.cn: 座头鲸不像齿鲸亚目鲸或齿鲸，它们是须鲸亚目、无害的大海兽，嘴里只有须鲸板。
